name: IoT company
desc: Internet of Things, extending Internet connectivity beyond conventional computing platforms into any non-internet-enabled physical devices and everyday objects.

name: Telecom
desc: A short name for a “telecommunications” company It provides infrastructure to connect people and things to each other.

name: Marketing
desc: A company that provides marketing services (to develop a strategy, plan and manage campaigns or may provide specific services, such as telemarketing or market research) on behalf of another business.

name: Energy
desc: A company involved in the production and sale of energy, including fuel extraction, manufacturing, refining and distribution.

name: Pharmaceutical
desc: A company that discovers, develops, produces, and markets drugs for use as medications to be administered to patients to cure them, vaccinate them, or alleviate a symptom.

name: Finance
desc: Financial organization that accepts deposits (and pays out interest on them) and lends to consumers and/or businesses.

name: Farming company
desc: A livestock company that builds tools, abilities and a culture that acts on the data from the animals and plants.

name: Government
desc: The government uses Data Science and its applications to improve the provision of basic services to the masses.

name: Insurance
desc: A company that provides coverage, in the form of compensation resulting from loss, damages, injury, treatment or hardship in exchange for premium payments.

name: Transport
desc: Data Science projects help transportation companies with the demands of customers to have their freight delivered as fast as possible, as cheap as possible.
